siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
blogPost.body: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
blogPost.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach
blogPost.author: Nico Aguilar

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的声音的健身会员。您可以获得关于您的口语风格的即时反馈，并随着时间的推移追踪您的进步。个性化的活动帮助您在每天5分钟内培养新技能。您很快就会变得自信满满。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.动力公共演讲和主持人教练)

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.動力公共演講和主持人教練)

previous.excerpt: Bitclout is a social network built on a blockchain where all users have a creator's coin and where everyone can buy and sell those coins using bitclout crypto-currency
previous.title: BitClout - A crypto social network

localize.description: Bitclout是一个建立在区块链上的社交网络，所有的用户都有一个创客币，每个人都可以使用bitclout加密货币买卖这些硬币
Bitclout是一個建立在區塊鏈上的社交網絡，所有的用戶都有一個創客幣，每個人都可以使用bitclout加密貨幣買賣這些硬幣

next.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****
next.title: Slideshare - Share presentations and resources, easily

localize.description: 不要让你的听众等待后续的电子邮件! 分享幻灯片或资源从未如此简单。上传您的内容，将您的自定义二维码添加到任何演示文稿中，并简化共享。目前所有早期用户均可免费使用****。
localize.tagline: 轻松分享演示文稿和资源

localize.description: 不要讓你的聽衆等待後續的電子郵件! 分享幻燈片或資源從未如此簡單。上傳您的內容，將您的自定義二維碼添加到任何演示文稿中，並簡化共享。目前所有早期用戶均可免費使用****。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆分享演示文稿和資源
